comment: The area of a quadrilateral with two sides which are parallel to the y-axis in ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is its width multiplied by the average height of its higher edge minus the average height of its lower edge. Co-author TA. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 31-May-2019.)
